original_jd:
Job Description-

This role will blend business acumen with technical proficiency, requiring the ability to understand complex business processes and translate them into effective system configurations. You will be a key player in ensuring our systems accurately reflect business needs and operate efficiently. This position will focus heavily on the developing new processes with technical solutions with the vehicle configuration space. The position will utilize ML and AI to quickly develop solutions.

 • Collaborate with stakeholders across various departments to understand business needs, gather detailed requirements, and document them clearly and concisely using various techniques (e.g., user stories, use cases, process flows). 

• Translate business requirements into technical configurations within our [mention specific system] backend. This includes, but is not limited to:

 • Developing and maintaining configuration specifications.

 • Creating and modifying data mappings and integrations.

 • Implementing and testing new configurations.

 • Troubleshooting and resolving configuration-related issues. 

• Analyze existing data to identify trends, inefficiencies, and areas for improvement. This may involve querying databases, generating reports, and visualizing data using appropriate tools. 

• Identify opportunities to streamline business processes and improve system efficiency through configuration changes and best practices. 

• Thoroughly test configurations to ensure they meet requirements and function as expected. Participate in user acceptance testing (UAT). 

• Maintain comprehensive documentation of system configurations, processes, and troubleshooting steps. 

• Work closely with developers, IT support, and other stakeholders to ensure smooth implementation and ongoing support of system configurations.

Skills Required:

-Strong analytical and problem-solving skills. -Excellent communication, interpersonal, and collaboration skills. -Ability to translate complex technical information into easily understandable terms for non-technical audiences.

Skills Preferred:

-Java experience -SQL experience

Experience Required:

-ML experience and implementation experience

Experience Preferred:

-Experience with Agile methodologies is a plus. -Experience with vehicle configuration is a plus.
enhanced_versions:
Role Overview:
This role is a critical bridge between business needs and technical solutions, blending strategic thinking with hands-on configuration expertise. As a key member of the team, you will be responsible for understanding complex business processes, translating them into effective system configurations, and ensuring our technology accurately reflects and supports the organization's objectives. Your ability to collaborate cross-functionally, identify optimization opportunities, and deliver robust technical solutions will be essential in driving the continued evolution and success of our vehicle configuration systems.

Key Responsibilities:
- Collaborate with stakeholders across the organization to gather detailed business requirements and document them using industry-standard techniques (e.g., user stories, use cases, process flows)
- Translate business requirements into technical configurations within our [mention specific system] backend, including developing and maintaining configuration specifications, creating and modifying data mappings and integrations, implementing and testing new configurations, and troubleshooting/resolving configuration-related issues
- Analyze existing data to identify trends, inefficiencies, and areas for improvement, leveraging database querying, reporting, and data visualization tools
- Proactively identify opportunities to streamline business processes and improve system efficiency through configuration changes and best practices
- Thoroughly test configurations to ensure they meet requirements and function as expected, and participate in user acceptance testing (UAT)
- Maintain comprehensive documentation of system configurations, processes, and troubleshooting steps
- Work closely with developers, IT support, and other stakeholders to ensure smooth implementation and ongoing support of system configurations

Required Skills:
- Strong analytical and problem-solving skills, with the ability to think strategically and identify innovative solutions
- Excellent communication, interpersonal, and collaboration skills, enabling you to translate complex technical information into easily understandable terms for non-technical audiences
- Proficiency in understanding and documenting business requirements using industry-standard techniques

Preferred Skills:
- Experience with Java and SQL, which will be instrumental in developing and maintaining the technical configurations
- Familiarity with machine learning (ML) and artificial intelligence (AI) concepts, as these will be leveraged to enhance the vehicle configuration process

Required Experience:
- Demonstrable experience in a similar role, where you have successfully translated business requirements into technical solutions
- A track record of collaborating with cross-functional teams and stakeholders to deliver robust, user-friendly systems
- Proven ability to analyze data, identify optimization opportunities, and implement process improvements

Preferred Experience:
- Experience with Agile methodologies, which will enable you to work in a fast-paced, iterative environment
- Familiarity with vehicle configuration systems, which will provide valuable context and domain-specific knowledge

Tools & Technologies:
- [Mention specific system] backend
- SQL and database querying tools
- Data visualization and reporting tools
- Agile project management tools

Work Environment & Expectations:
- This role will be primarily office-based, with the opportunity to collaborate with teams across the organization
- You will be expected to work in an Agile environment, participating in regular meetings, sprint planning, and retrospectives
- Strong communication and interpersonal skills are essential, as you will be interacting with stakeholders at all levels of the organization

Role Overview:
As a technical configuration specialist, you will play a pivotal role in bridging the gap between business needs and technical solutions within our vehicle configuration systems. Leveraging your deep understanding of complex business processes and your proficiency in translating them into effective system configurations, you will be instrumental in ensuring our technology accurately reflects and supports the organization's objectives. Your ability to analyze data, identify optimization opportunities, and deliver robust technical solutions will be crucial in driving the continuous improvement and success of our vehicle configuration capabilities.

Key Responsibilities:
- Collaborate closely with cross-functional stakeholders to gather detailed business requirements, using a variety of techniques (e.g., user stories, use cases, process flows) to document them clearly and concisely
- Translate the gathered business requirements into technical configurations within our [mention specific system] backend, including developing and maintaining configuration specifications, creating and modifying data mappings and integrations, implementing and testing new configurations, and troubleshooting/resolving configuration-related issues
- Analyze existing data to identify trends, inefficiencies, and areas for improvement, utilizing database querying, reporting, and data visualization tools to uncover insights and drive informed decision-making
- Proactively identify opportunities to streamline business processes and enhance system efficiency through configuration changes and the implementation of industry best practices
- Thoroughly test configurations to ensure they meet requirements and function as expected, actively participating in user acceptance testing (UAT) to validate the quality and usability of the solutions
- Maintain comprehensive documentation of system configurations, processes, and troubleshooting steps to support ongoing maintenance and future enhancements
- Collaborate closely with developers, IT support, and other stakeholders to ensure the smooth implementation and ongoing support of the system configurations

Required Skills:
- Exceptional analytical and problem-solving skills, with the ability to think strategically and devise innovative technical solutions
- Excellent communication, interpersonal, and collaboration abilities, enabling you to effectively translate complex technical information into easily understandable terms for non-technical audiences
- Strong proficiency in understanding and documenting business requirements using industry-standard techniques

Preferred Skills:
- Hands-on experience with Java and SQL, which will be crucial in developing and maintaining the technical configurations within the [mention specific system] backend
- Knowledge of machine learning (ML) and artificial intelligence (AI) concepts, as these will be leveraged to enhance the vehicle configuration process and drive continuous improvements

Required Experience:
- Proven track record of successfully translating business requirements into technical solutions in a similar role
- Demonstrated experience in collaborating with cross-functional teams and stakeholders to deliver robust, user-friendly systems
- A history of analyzing data, identifying optimization opportunities, and implementing process improvements to enhance system efficiency and effectiveness

Preferred Experience:
- Familiarity with Agile methodologies, which will enable you to thrive in a fast-paced, iterative work environment
- Knowledge of vehicle configuration systems, providing valuable domain-specific expertise and context

Tools & Technologies:
- [Mention specific system] backend
- SQL and database querying tools
- Data visualization and reporting tools
- Agile project management software

Work Environment & Expectations:
- This role will be primarily office-based, with ample opportunities to collaborate with teams across the organization
- You will be expected to work in an Agile environment, actively participating in regular meetings, sprint planning, and retrospective sessions
- Strong communication and interpersonal skills are essential, as you will be interacting with stakeholders at all levels of the organization, from technical teams to business leaders

Role Overview:
As a technical configuration specialist, you will be a key player in ensuring our vehicle configuration systems accurately reflect and support the evolving business needs of our organization. By blending your deep understanding of complex business processes with your proficiency in translating them into effective system configurations, you will play a crucial role in driving the continuous improvement and success of our technology solutions. Your ability to collaborate cross-functionally, analyze data, and identify optimization opportunities will be instrumental in delivering robust, user-friendly systems that enhance efficiency and drive business value.

- Engage with stakeholders across various departments to gather detailed business requirements, leveraging industry-standard techniques (e.g., user stories, use cases, process flows) to document them clearly and concisely
- Translate the gathered business requirements into technical configurations within our [mention specific system] backend, including developing and maintaining configuration specifications, creating and modifying data mappings and integrations, implementing and testing new configurations, and troubleshooting/resolving configuration-related issues
- Analyze existing data to identify trends, inefficiencies, and areas for improvement, utilizing database querying, reporting, and data visualization tools to uncover insights that inform strategic decision-making
- Proactively identify opportunities to streamline business processes and enhance system efficiency through the implementation of configuration changes and industry best practices

- Maintain comprehensive documentation of system configurations, processes, and troubleshooting steps to support ongoing maintenance and future enhancements
- Collaborate closely with developers, IT support, and other stakeholders to ensure the smooth implementation and ongoing support of the system configurations
